calcMaxHeight(Graphics) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Calculates the maximum height required for the UML component based on its attributes and methods.
calcMaxWidth(Graphics) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Calculates the maximum width required for the UML component, based on its name, attributes, and methods.
Class - Class in business
Represents a Class in a business application.
Class() - Constructor for class business.Class
Constructs a default Class with the name "Class", no attributes or methods, no partitions, and a default position.
Class(String, int, boolean, Point) - Constructor for class business.Class
Constructs a Class with the specified name, number of partitions, drawPartition flag, and position.
ClassDiagram - Class in business
Represents a Class Diagram in a business application.
ClassDiagram() - Constructor for class business.ClassDiagram
 
ClassDiagramUI - Class in ui
The ClassDiagramUI class represents the user interface for creating and managing UML Class Diagrams.
ClassDiagramUI() - Constructor for class ui.ClassDiagramUI
Constructs a new ClassDiagramUI instance and initializes the UI components and event listeners.
ClassDiagramUI.SamplesPanel - Class in ui
The SamplesPanel class is a JPanel that displays a set of UML component samples (e.g., Class, Association, Inheritance, Aggregation, Composition, Comment, Comment Line) that can be clicked to add new components to a UML canvas.
ClassDiagramUI.UMLCanvas - Class in ui
A custom JPanel that provides a canvas for displaying draggable, editable, and deletable UML components such as classes, comments, and associations.
ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent - Class in ui
The UMLComponent class is a class that draws a set of UML components (e.g., Class, Association, Inheritance, Aggregation, Composition, Comment, Comment Line) onto the canvas, that can be clicked to edit or delete.
CodeGenerator - Class in business
The CodeGenerator class processes JSON input to generate Java class definitions and manage relationships between the classes (e.g., inheritance, association).
CodeGenerator() - Constructor for class business.CodeGenerator
 
Comment - Class in business
Represents a comment component used in a graphical application context.
Comment() - Constructor for class business.Comment
Default constructor for creating an empty comment with a placeholder name and no specific text or position.
Comment(String, Point) - Constructor for class business.Comment
Constructor for creating a comment with default name as "Comment..." and specified text and position.
Comment(String, String, Point) - Constructor for class business.Comment
Constructor for creating a comment with a specific name, comment text, and position.
Component - Interface in business
The Component interface represents a generic component that can be part of a UML or use case diagram.
contains(Point) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Checks if the given point is inside the bounds of the UML component.
contains(Point) - Method in class ui.UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Checks if a given point is within the bounds of the UML component.
containsAttributeOrMethod(Point, String) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Checks if the point is within an attribute or method section of the UML component.
containsLine(Point) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Checks if the given point is inside a line-based component (e.g., Association).
containsLine(Point) - Method in class ui.UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLComponent
Checks if a given point is within the bounds of a line-based UML component.
createNewComponent(String) - Method in class ui.ClassDiagramUI.UMLCanvas
Creates a new UML component at a default position on the canvas.
createNewComponent(String) - Method in class ui.UseCaseDiagramUI.UMLCanvas
Creates a new UML component of the specified type and adds it to the canvas.
